item.title: [SPARK-12562] DataFrame.write.format("text") requires the column name to be called value
item.description:
We should support writing any DataFrame that has a single string column, independent of the name.

wiki.select("text")
  .limit(10000)
  .write
  .format("text")
  .mode("overwrite")
  .save("/home/michael/wiki.txt")
